name: DrupalEstate
short_description:
DrupalEstate is a drupal based property listing site which offers paid property listing, free property listing,google maps support, new property notifications, open house, private message, integration with paypal. it uses freely available drupal module with some customization. you can see a live demo here:
http://rentsellmyhouse.com
summary: Property listing, real estate site based on druapl 5.x
